answerText: What can I do for you?

questionText: My day was pretty good today!
I had a good day today
I don't have anybody to talk with recently
I don't know who to talk too
answerText: If you are having trouble making freinds or talking with someone you can try meeting people online.

questionText: I got into an arguement with my friend and I don't know how too talk with tehm about it
answerText: You should make amends and try talking it out.

questionText: I feel my depression is at a all time low
answerText: If you haven't already you should try seeking professional help and talk with someone you feel comfortbale with.

questionText: I get nervous around people easily
It's hard for me too make eye contact with people
I get sweaty and nervous when talking to people
How should I talk to people?
answerText: Talking with people for the first time can be hard, but you should try
